description: Titus has had it pretty easy so far, but Ashton is changing that. The smooth young twink has been stripped naked and roped to a pallet, left hanging from chains in the dungeon. On hand is a whole bucket of molten wax that Ashton can't wait to splash over him! His cries are ignored as the devious dom coats him in it, then gets his big uncut cock out to fuck his throat!
title: Titus Snow & Ashton Bradley
